article.title: MetroStar Taps Belcher, Drickey for Senior Positions
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: MetroStar Systems, Reston, Virginia, has named Col. Michael F. Belcher, USMC (Ret.), vice president of Defense Strategy and Operations, and Lt. Col. Michael Drickey, USA (Ret.), senior director for Strategic Capture.
